page.title: 10Agriculture
page.content: Most of the land in our Domesday Area is used for agriculture,in fact, seventy per cent of the land in our Domesday block is agricultural land. The most common crop is barley which is used in the whisky making industry and for the winter feeding of cattle. Another extensievlygrown crop is potatoes.The bulk of this crop is grown for seed potatoes.The reason for this is that the soil in this area is free from insects,like eel worm,which attacks crops.On Brahan Estate they grow new varieties, starting from stem cuttings. Very few cattle are kept ,but sheep are brought in from the out lying areas for fattening over the winter time .Farming is very highly mechanised and as a result the number of men working on the land is quite small compared with fifty years ago.
